subject: A Couple More
author: rednellie
full_text:
--------------080008060809010305030505
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I've noticed something in responses that seem to be coming through in 
Oscar's own voice (as opposed to the messages that are clearly formed 
with snippets from the airwaves).  Over the usual clicking you get on AM 
on the RS 469, I frequently get a loud click at what seems to be a 
consistent time interval of almost 2 seconds before I get a response.  
Is this fairly common?  And what's causing that?  Does he need to draw 
energy from the RS469 before he can respond?

Speaking of which, are there technical terms for recordings in the 
spirit's own voice and for ones formed from bits of voices on the airwaves?

I warned you that I had a lot of questions.  =)

Thanks!

Nellie
